chargeHist.descr: Criminal Trespass to Energy Provider Property

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Criminal Trespass to Energy Provider Property

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael Allen Boyd

records.addlTxt: Request from Deft to reduce dean fee payments - Request DENIED by Judge

Defendant Michael Allen Boyd in court.  Attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney William Reabe in court for Michael Allen Boyd. 
3:29 p.m.
Prelim Questionnaire/Waiver filed.
Court finds Deft freely waives prelim.
Deft bound over for trial.
Atty Reabe ready to proceed to Arraignment subject to Information tracking Complaint. 
ADA heard - Information will track Complaint.
Atty Reabe waives reading.
Enters not guilty pleas.
3:34 p.m.
Status conference scheduled for November 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
8:39 AM Defendant Michael Allen Boyd appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Court inquires on atty.
Deft heard - has not been appointed an atty yet.
ADA heard - Deft has been appointed Reabe.
Atty Christensen is present on behalf of Atty Reabe for scheduling purposes.
Deft waives time limits.
Court schedules with parties.
8:41 AM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Arraignment scheduled for August 24, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Dean appt Atty Reabe- Repayment at $100/mo commencing August 1, 2022.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: Letter for JA to Deft, Re: Dean fees

9:05 AM Defendant Michael Allen Boyd in court.  Attorney DeShea Morrow in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Court inquires on Atty - does not qualify for PD representation.
Provides dean paperwork to the court.
Deft sworn in.
Court reviews dean form with Deft.
Court orders Deft to repay dean fees at $100 per month beginning 08-01-2022.
If Deft gets a job, must file a wage assignment with the court.
Deft understands.
Court schedules.
9:09 AM
Status conference scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.

1:25 PM Prosecuting attorney Kathryn E Heineck in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Michael Allen Boyd appeared by ZOOM, in custody. 
Copy of comp.
Court heard on charges and penalties.
ADA heard on bail and priors.
Deft heard on bail.
Court sets $2,500 signature bond w/conditions: sign waiver of extradition, no contact with WPS properties, may not possess or consume any alcohol or illegal substances that are illegal in WI.
Deft to contact Public Defender's office.
Court schedules w/parties.
1:29 pm
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.
